name: Ice Cream & Goulash
description:
"Something is off in IG inc. The machine that produces Ice cream and Goulash has stopped working! Inconceivable! So much revenue was lost! You, lizard, go there and find what is the problem, now!"

Ice and Gulash is a Puzzle platformer in which you control Dilla, an Armadillo Lizard tasked with entering the factory of IG inc, one of the biggest macrocorporations in the country, and find out what is causing the slow supply of both Ice Cream and Goulash.

To fulfill this important mission you are given the Thermostator 7000! A machine capable of changing the temperature of the environment! With a single press of a button, you can change between 0º and 100º! But be aware, as a lizard, you have to take care of your temperature, or else you could die!

This game was done for Indie Spain Jam 2022!

Controls:

Right key/Left key: Movement

Space: Jump

Q/W/E: Change the temperature of the room
